Big Rapids, MI 49307
RE: License #: CB540201289
Mecosta/Osceola Youth Attention Center
126 Maple St., Suite F
Big Rapids, MI 49307
Dear Ms. Eddinger:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
May 10, 2021. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager, Claudia Triestram at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,
Stephanie Meeuwenberg, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 200
121 Franklin Street SE
Grand Rapids, MI 49507
enclosure
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not request consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period and there were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this
licensing period.
The agency has not been on corrective action plans during this licensing period. The
agency continues to operate effective and efficiently without any issues. During this
period under review, they maintained three staff and hired one new staff. The
agency was able to adapt to the COVID issues and continue to ensure safety of the
youth in the program without issue.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility continue on a regular license.
_____________________________________May 12, 2021
Stephanie Meeuwenberg Date
